Html:
I want to make sure that I'm compiling and referencing this assembly correctly.  Here are the steps that I followed:

1).  set the Compile | Configuration to 'Release'
2).  added a reference to the assembly in my application by navigating to the HtmlAgilityPack.dll in the Release folder.

Would it make more sense to simply copy the DLL to my application's BIN directory, then reference it from there?

Thanks.
